TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract WebClientProtocol extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class WebClientProtocol Inherits Component
public ref class WebClientProtocol abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 指定使用 ASP.NET 创建的所有 XML Web services 客户端代理的基类。

span.span: Specifies the base class for all XML Web service client proxies created using ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性用于控制传输 XML Web service 请求和响应时使用的传输行为。The properties of the class are used to control the behavior of the transport used to transmit the XML Web service request and response. 此类的属性映射到 上找到的属性。The properties on this class map to properties found on . 派生自 的类的实例（如 ）用作使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services 的传输机制。Instances of classes deriving from , such as , are used as the transport mechanism for XML Web services created using ASP.NET. 若要与 XML Web service 通信，必须创建间接或直接从要调用的 XML Web service 派生的代理类。To communicate with an XML Web service, you must create a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service you want to call. 您可以使用 Wsdl.exe 工具创建给定 XML Web service 的服务说明的代理类，而不是手动创建代理类。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, you can use the Wsdl.exe tool to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 由于 是客户端代理的基类，因此你将在代理类中找到其属性。Since is the base class for your client proxy, you will find its properties on your proxy classes. 这些属性对于控制基础传输的请求行为很有用。These properties are useful for controlling the request behavior of the underlying transport. 例如，使用 属性调用通过身份验证的 XML Web 服务。For instance, use the property for calling authenticated XML Web services. 许多 属性用于初始化用于发出 Web 请求的 对象。Many of the properties are used to initialize the object that is used to make the Web request. ## Examples 下面的示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，它调用名为 `Math`的 XML Web service。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在 `EnterBtn_Click` 函数内，Web 窗体在调用远程 XML Web service 方法之前，在代理类上设置代理信息和客户端凭据。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form sets proxy information and client credentials on the proxy class prior to calling the remote XML Web service method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

threadsafe.span: 对于每个 XML Web service 方法调用，此类的属性都将复制到 对象的新实例中。

span.span: The properties on this class are copied into a new instance of a object for each XML Web service method call.

threadsafe.span: 尽管可以同时从不同的线程对同一 实例调用 XML Web service 方法，但没有完成同步，以确保将属性的一致快照传输到 对象。

span.span: While you can call XML Web service methods on the same instance from different threads at the same time, there is no synchronization done to ensure that a consistent snapshot of the properties will get transferred to the object.

threadsafe.span: 因此，如果需要修改属性并从不同线程进行并发方法调用，则应使用 XML Web service 代理的不同实例，或提供自己的同步。

span.span: Therefore if you need to modify the properties and make concurrent method calls from different threads you should use a different instance of the XML Web service proxy or provide your own synchronization.
Script Exploits Overview

The name of the connection group.
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 客户端身份验证的安全凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets security credentials for XML Web service client authentication.

value.span: XML Web services 客户端的 。

span.span: The for the XML Web service client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `Credentials` 属性时，XML Web service 客户端必须实例化实现 的类（例如 ），然后设置特定于身份验证机制的客户端凭据。When using the `Credentials` property, a XML Web service client must instantiate a class implementing , such as , and then set the client credentials specific to the authentication mechanism. 类可用于使用基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证机制设置身份验证凭据。The class can be used to set authentication credentials using the basic, digest, NTLM and Kerberos authentication mechanisms. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则客户端将与服务器进行协商，并根据服务器的配置方式执行 Kerberos 和/或 NTLM 身份验证。When the property is set to then the client negotiates with the server to do Kerberos and/or NTLM authentication depending on how the server is configured. ## Examples 下面的示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，它调用名为 `Math`的 XML Web service。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在 `EnterBtn_Click` 函数内，Web 窗体使用 `Credentials` 属性显式设置身份验证凭据。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form explicitly sets authentication credentials using the `Credentials` property. 用户名、密码和域会传递到 类的构造函数中。The user name, password and domain are passed into the constructor for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅For more information, see. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 这一受保护的方法由 XML Web services 客户端基础结构调用来获取新的 传输对象，以传输 XML Web services 请求。

span.span: This protected method is called by the XML Web service client infrastructure to get a new transport object to transmit the XML Web service request.
The instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以重写此方法，以便在发出 XML Web service 请求之前自定义 对象。This method can be overridden to customize the object before the XML Web service request is made. 例如，可以将自定义标头添加到请求。For example you could add a custom header to the request.

span.span: The parameter is .

span.span: This protected method is called by the XML Web service client infrastructure to get the response from a synchronous XML Web service request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreAuthenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreAuthenticate : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置是否启用了预身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets whether pre-authentication is enabled.

value.span: 若要对请求进行预身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to pre-authenticate the request; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端请求资源时，如果没有使用凭据，则服务器会质询请求，并指示它支持的身份验证方案。When a client requests a resource without using credentials, the server challenges the request and indicates what authentication schemes it supports. 客户端选择身份验证方案，并向服务器发送相应的 `WWW-authenticate` 标头。The client chooses an authentication scheme and sends the appropriate `WWW-authenticate` header to the server. `true` 时，`WWW-authenticate` 标头将随所有后续请求一起发送。When is `true`, the `WWW-authenticate` header is sent with all subsequent requests. `false` 时，将对 XML Web service 方法发出请求，而不会在最初尝试对用户进行身份验证。When is `false`, a request is made to the XML Web service method without initially attempting to authenticate the user. 如果 XML Web service 允许匿名访问，则执行 XML Web service 方法。If the XML Web service allows anonymous access, then the XML Web service method is executed. 如果不允许匿名访问，则会向客户端发回 401 HTTP 返回代码。If anonymous access is disallowed, a 401 HTTP return code is sent back to the client. 作为响应， 类将身份验证凭据返回到 Web 服务器。In response, the class returns authentication credentials to the Web server. 如果客户端进行了身份验证，并且随后有权访问 XML Web service，则执行 XML Web service 方法;否则，客户端将被拒绝访问。If the client is authenticated and subsequently authorized to access the XML Web service, the XML Web service method is executed; otherwise the client is denied access.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ RequestEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };
member this.RequestEncoding : System.Text.Encoding with get, set

summary.span: 用于对 XML Web services 发出客户端请求的 。

span.span: The used to make the client request to the XML Web service.

value.span: 客户端请求的字符编码。

span.span: The character encoding for the client request.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它将默认编码用于基础传输和协议。

span.span: The default is , which uses the default encoding for the underlying transport and protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定请求消息的编码。The determines the encoding for the request message. 将用编码值注释请求的 。The of the request will be annotated with the encoding value. 派生自 的类支持特定协议，如 对于 SOAP，请将此属性设置为符合特定协议的编码要求。Classes deriving from support a particular protocol, such as does for SOAP, set this property to conform to encoding requirements for the specific protocol. 例如， 将默认编码设置为 UTF-8。For example, the sets the default encoding to UTF-8. ## Examples 下面的示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，它调用名为 `Math`的 XML Web service。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在 `EnterBtn_Click` 函数内，Web 窗体将 RequestEncoding 显式设置为 UTF-8。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form explicitly sets RequestEncoding to UTF-8. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 指示 XML Web services 客户端等待同步 XML Web services 请求完成的时间（以毫秒计）的回复。

span.span: Indicates the time an XML Web service client waits for the reply to a synchronous XML Web service request to arrive (in milliseconds).

value.span: 对 XML Web services 的同步调用的超时（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The time out, in milliseconds, for synchronous calls to the XML Web service.
The default is 100000 milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 指示请求不会超时。即使 XML Web service 的客户端可以将 属性设置为不超时，Web 服务器仍可以在服务器端导致请求超时。Setting the property to indicates that the request does not time out. Even though an XML Web service client can set the property to not time out, the Web server can still cause the request to time out on the server side. ## Examples 下面的示例将对 `Math` XML Web service 中的 `Add` XML Web service 方法的同步调用的 `Timeout` 值设置为15000（15秒）。The following example sets the `Timeout` value to 15000 (15 seconds) for the synchronous call to the `Add` XML Web service method within the `Math` XML Web service. [!code-cpp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 的基 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URL of the XML Web service the client is requesting.

value.span: 客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 的基 URL。

span.span: The base URL of the XML Web service the client is requesting.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Wsdl.exe 生成的代理类将设置默认 属性，供客户端使用。Proxy classes generated using Wsdl.exe will set a default property for the client to use. 默认 由生成代理类的服务说明中找到的位置属性确定。The default is determined by the location attribute found in the service description from which the proxy class was generated. 支持特定协议的派生类（如 和 ）可能会将额外的信息添加到 以进行 XML Web service 请求。Derived classes supporting specific protocols, such as and might add extra information to to make the XML Web service request. 可以更改 属性，以引用从其生成代理类的相同服务说明的任何 XML Web service。The property can be changed to refer to any XML Web service that implements the same service description that the proxy class was generated from. ## Examples 下面的示例将 `math` XML Web service 的 属性更改为名为 `http:// www.contoso.com`的 Web 服务器。The following example changes the property for the `math` XML Web service to the Web server named `http:// www.contoso.com`. [!code-cpp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
